Context:
* George Brown College has the largest EV technician program in North America.
* The Canadian government aims to increase the Canadian supply of zero-emission vehicles and set a 2035 target for 100% of new vehicles sold to be emissions-free.
* Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault made an announcement regarding the Electric Vehicle Availability Standard at George Brown's Daphne Cockwell Centre for Health Sciences.
* The EV Technician program is a one-year certificate program offered by George Brown College that trains students to service electric vehicles and charging stations.
* Federal politicians, representatives from the Canadian Lung Association and Plug and Drive, and George Brown College Senior Vice-President of External Relations, Communications and Real Estate Development joined Minister Guilbeault at the announcement.
* The EV Technician program was launched by George Brown College in 2022 to meet surging demand for EV servicing professionals.

Context:
* George Brown College launched the EV Technician program in 2022.
* The program is an online and self-paced certificate program.
* It uses simulation software to train students to diagnose, service, and repair powertrains and control systems in EVs from Tesla, Nissan, and General Motors.
* The installation and maintenance of charging stations is also a part of the program.
* No technical experience is necessary to enroll in the program.
* More than 600 students have already enrolled.
* George Brown College has partnered with 19 colleges and universities across Canada and the United States to administer the EV Technician program.
* George Brown College will soon launch other "clean tech" programs, including the Wind Turbine Technician program this spring.
* For more information about the EV Technician program or to sign up, visit the website or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* The phone number for inquiries is 416-415-2000 and the TTY number is 1-877-515-5559.
* Visit George Brown College's social media hub for more information.
* The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice.
